title: Rofikul Masud - CV
text:
r.masud@g.nsu.ru  Telegram   linkedin  github  orcid  CV


Education
B.Sc. in Computer Science and Computer Engineering
Novosibirsk National Research State University, Faculty of Information Technologies, Sept 2021 ‚Äì Aug 2025
Thesis: Using machine learning tools to solve direct and inverse problems in determining the environment near the wellbore based on signals from the VIKPB device
Expected presentation at 2025 IEEE XVII APEIE Conference, Nov 2025


Research Experience
Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, A.P. Ershov Institute of Informatics Systems, Russian Academy of Sciences ‚Äì Research Intern
June 2025 ‚Äì January 2026, Novosibirsk, Russia
- Developed and evaluated ML models.
- Conducted literature reviews and supported experimental design.
- Preprocessed data and maintained research code.
- Contributed to documentation, posters, and conference presentations.

- Improved ML models for high-frequency electromagnetic data analysis.
- Experimented with neural networks and classical ML methods.
- Developed computational modeling software for data interpretation.

Professional Experience

May 2024 ‚Äì July 2024, Novosibirsk, Russia
- Researched and validated ML models for risk prediction.
- Automated processes with Python, ensured data quality, and improved model performance.
Machine Learning Engineer ‚Äî OOO AITISIB
Jul 2024 ‚Äì Jun 2025 | Novosibirsk, Russia
- Designed, trained, and deployed machine learning models for predictive financial analytics.
- Integrated AI-driven automation into financial platforms to enhance decision-making and operational efficiency.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate model deployment and streamline development cycles.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize infrastructure for AI-driven financial applications, improving performance and reliability.
- Focused on model scalability, security, and interpretability to support enterprise-grade systems.


Skills
Programming: Python, Java, C/C++, SQL, Go, JavaScript, Haskell
Software Engineering: OOP, functional programming, data structures, algorithms, OS, design patterns, REST APIs, microservices
Machine Learning & AI: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, NLP (HuggingFace, BERT, GPT), Computer Vision (OpenCV, YOLO), Deep Learning
Data Science & Analysis: Pandas, NumPy, R, SQL, statistics, EDA, A/B testing
Visualization: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Tableau, Power BI
Databases & Backend: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, schema design, query optimization
Cloud & DevOps: Docker, Flask, FastAPI, AWS, GCP, CI/CD
Languages: English (C1), Bengali (Native), Russian (B2), German (A1)

title: Rofikul Masud
text:
Rofikul Masud
 LinkedIn
 GitHub
 ORCID



Hi there! I‚Äôm a recent Computer Science graduate from Novosibirsk National Research State University (NSU) ‚Äî right in the heart of the Russian academic hub in Western Siberia. I‚Äôm about to begin my Master‚Äôs degree, with plans to pursue a PhD in Machine Learning fields.
My Bachelor‚Äôs dissertation (NSU, 2025), titled ‚ÄúUsing Machine Learning Methods to Model and Interpret Problems in Determining the Parameters of the Medium Near the Well Using Signals from a High-Frequency Induction Logging While Drilling Device‚Äù, explored the intersection of data science and applied geophysics ‚Äî sparking my ongoing fascination with machine learning research.
Outside academics, I‚Äôm both a tech enthusiast and a lover of the arts. I enjoy classical music (Western and South Asian), reading (literature, history, and philosophy), and watching films and documentaries. I also love visiting theatres and museums, and engaging in open discussions and debates ‚Äî something I developed a passion for during my school debating days.
I also enjoy writing ‚Äî sharing thoughts on art, history, and personal experiences through blogs and short stories. Recently, I‚Äôve been diving into language learning: I speak English and Russian fluently, and I‚Äôm currently learning German ‚Äî not easy, but definitely rewarding!
